name: Paladin
description: A holy warrior bound to a sacred oath.
starting_equipment: Martial Weapon and Shield or Two Martial Weapons
Five Javelins or any Simple Melee Weapon

features.name: Divine Sense
features.description: The presence of strong evil registers on your senses like a noxious odor, and powerful good rings like heavenly music in your ears. You can detect the location of any celestial, fiend, or undead within 60 feet. You can use this feature a number of times equal to 1 + your Charisma modifier.

features.name: Lay on Hands
features.description: Your blessed touch can heal wounds. You have a pool of healing power that replenishes when you take a long rest. With that pool, you can restore a total number of hit points equal to your paladin level Ã— 5.

features.name: Fighting Style
features.description: You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty. Choose one fighting style option.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: By 2nd level, you have learned to draw on divine magic through meditation and prayer to cast spells. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for your paladin spells.

features.name: Divine Smite
features.description: Starting at 2nd level, when you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, you can expend one spell slot to deal radiant damage to the target, in addition to the weapon's damage.

features.name: Divine Health
features.description: By 3rd level, the divine magic flowing through you makes you immune to disease.

features.name: Sacred Oath
features.description: When you reach 3rd level, you swear the oath that binds you as a paladin forever. Your choice grants you features at 3rd level and again at 7th, 15th, and 20th level.

features.name: Channel Divinity
features.description: Your oath allows you to channel divine energy to fuel magical effects. You start with two effects determined by your oath.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: You can increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1. Alternatively, you can take a feat.

features.name: Extra Attack
features.description: Beginning at 5th level, you can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

features.name: Aura of Protection
features.description: Starting at 6th level, whenever you or a friendly creature within 10 feet of you must make a saving throw, the creature gains a bonus to the saving throw equal to your Charisma modifier.

features.name: Sacred Oath Feature
features.description: You gain a feature from your Sacred Oath.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: You can increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1. Alternatively, you can take a feat.

features.name: Aura of Courage
features.description: Starting at 10th level, you and friendly creatures within 10 feet of you can't be frightened while you are conscious.

features.name: Improved Divine Smite
features.description: By 11th level, you are so suffused with righteous might that all your melee weapon strikes carry divine power with them. Whenever you hit a creature with a melee weapon, the creature takes an extra 1d8 radiant damage.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: You can increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1. Alternatively, you can take a feat.

features.name: Cleansing Touch
features.description: Beginning at 14th level, you can use your action to end one spell on yourself or on one willing creature that you touch. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of once). You regain expended uses when you finish a long rest.

features.name: Sacred Oath Feature

features.name: Aura Improvements
features.description: At 18th level, the range of your auras increase to 30 feet.

subclasses.name: Oath of Devotion
subclasses.description: The Oath of Devotion binds a paladin to the loftiest ideals of justice, virtue, and order. Sometimes called cavaliers, white knights, or holy warriors, these paladins meet the ideal of the knight in shining armor, acting with honor in pursuit of justice and the greater good.

3.name: Sacred Weapon
3.description: As an action, you can imbue one weapon that you are holding with positive energy, using your Channel Divinity. For 1 minute, you add your Charisma modifier to attack rolls made with that weapon (minimum bonus of +1). The weapon also emits bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light 20 feet beyond that. If the weapon is not already magical, it becomes magical for the duration.

3.name: Turn the Unholy
3.description: As an action, you present your holy symbol and speak a prayer censuring fiends and undead, using your Channel Divinity. Each fiend or undead that can see or hear you within 30 feet of you must make a Wisdom saving throw. If the creature fails its saving throw, it is turned for 1 minute or until it takes damage.
